Name: Suyog
data: Putting together a new innovation lab was extremely challenging. Digital Shark took control of a crucial element, walked me through the process and then completed a great setup. Their ability to take our input and combine it with their knowledge was especially satisfying.

Name: Murali
data: May be one of the best courses that I have been on

Name: Anu
data: Training was excellent, tons of examples, very well explained - best week long course I have ever attended - well done.

Name: Prathibha
data: Engaging, interactive and made enjoyable to learn about. Considerable amount of content covered but at the right level I felt.

Name: Ravi
data: Enjoyed course, very interesting - tutor very friendly. Useful skills learnt.

Name: Prof. Sujatha
data: Good mix of lecturing to activity. Very helpful to have 'real life' examples of practices.

Name: Ravi
data: The content met the objectives of the course. Great learning experience, the content was relevant and practical.

Name: Ankur
data: The content met the objectives of the course. Great learning experience, the content was relevant and practical.
